channel.title: Gifts | Ason Baje
channel.description: One Stop Shop for all Occasion

item.title: Johnson Gift Pack Box
item.dc:creator: Tufail Shah
item.description: Tired of not know what to get, you want to say thank you but don’t know how? This product is great for those who want to give a special gift but don’t know what to choose to the new borns and ones just starting out. The product will come wrapped in a transparent gift wrap […]

item.title: Chef Mom Gift Pack Box (Combo Five)
item.dc:creator: Tufail Shah
item.description: Is your mom the best chef you know? Does she always do all the cooking and cleaning in your house? Is she a hero? This gift pack is perfect for her. The best part? She’ll learn to make a dish that you love, too. The set comes beautifully packaged in a white transparency with ribbon, […]

item.title: Gift Pack On Box (Combo Four)
item.dc:creator: Tufail Shah
item.description: Looking for a way to show how much you care about your loved ones without spending money on expensive gifts? This Nivea Crème Gift Pack has everything anyone would need to pamper themselves. It has a Mid-Size Nivea Moisturizing Crème, a travel size Nivea Facewash, and various other gifts that can be shared with friends […]

item.title: Gift Pack On Box (Combo Three)
item.dc:creator: Tufail Shah
item.description: Whether you’re buying for a friend, your sister, or yourself, the Ponds Gift Pack is a great way to show how much you care. It contains a whole range of essentials from facial wash to body lotion and is worth buying over. So whether it’s for mothers day, birthdays, or any other special occasion, this […]

item.title: Gift Pack On Box (Combo Two)
item.dc:creator: Tufail Shah
item.description: Your friends, family members, and loved ones deserve the best. This gift pack includes facial cleanser, day cream, and some sweet indulgence. Get unforgettable results with the power of Garnier cleanse and Brightness Crème created just for you. This Product package contains the following items: 1x Garnier Bright Complete Facewash 1x Garnier Bright Creme 2x […]

item.title: Gift Pack On Box (Combo One)

item.description: Himalaya – the brand you have trusted for years is now on sales in Ason Baje with offering a gift pack that contains some of their most popular products.
